pkgmetadata.longdescription: Object Oriented Advanced Clustering // S4 Object Oriented for Advanced Fuzzy Clustering and Fuzzy COnsensus Clustering. Techniques that provided by this package are Fuzzy C-Means, Gustafson Kessel (Babuska Version), Gath-Geva, Sum Voting Consensus, Product Voting Consensus, and Borda Voting Consensus. This package also provide visualization via Biplot and Radar Plot.
